meanings.definition: A system for transmitting visual images and sound that are reproduced on screens
meanings.sent1: Our new television allows us to watch movies and shows on a big screen.
meanings.sent2: Every evening, I relax on the couch and enjoy watching television.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally bumped into the television, and it started showing everything upside down!
meanings.sent4: Her smile lit up the room like a television screen in a dark theater.
meanings.sent5: The vivid colors on the television made the nature documentary come to life.

meanings.definition: The activity of watching television programs
meanings.sent1: My favorite part of the day is when I get to sit down and enjoy television.
meanings.sent2: Television is a popular pastime for many people around the world.
meanings.sent3: I tried to break the world record for the longest television marathon, but fell asleep after two episodes!
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were glued to the television, captivated by the thrilling plot.
meanings.sent5: The sound of laughter filled the room as we all gathered around the television to watch a comedy show.

meanings.definition: A device with a screen that receives television signals and displays images
meanings.sent1: The television in our living room is so old, it still has knobs to change channels.
meanings.sent2: I need to adjust the brightness on the television to see the picture clearly.
meanings.sent3: My cat thinks the television is a magical window and tries to catch the moving images!
meanings.sent4: The reflection of the sunset on the television screen painted the room in warm hues.
meanings.sent5: The high-definition television made every detail in the movie crystal clear.
